description.value:
Ammunition projectile

Invented by Zo! Media prop designers, this special ammunition is designed to explode in a dramatic fanfare fit for a media production without sacrificing any lethality. A weapon loaded with POW! ammunition automatically attempts to [[/act feint]] targets within its first range increment. Targets of your Feint are @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Off-Guard] against ranged attacks in your first range increment rather than melee attacks, depending on the result of the save.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
